verses.1: Pasian aw, dai dide-in om kei in. Lungnuamin, tang loin om mawk kei in, Pasian aw.
verses.2: Bang hang hiam cih leh na galte in gamlumna piangsak uh a, nang hong mudahte kiphasak mahmah uh hi.
verses.3: Amaute in khem siamna tawh na mite thangsiah uh a, amaute in na it mite langpangin thu kikum uh hi.
verses.4: Amaute in, “Hong pai un, minam khat hihna panin amaute beisak ni. Israel min peuhmah kiphawksak nawn kei ni!” ci uh hi.
verses.5: Amaute in siat nading geelin kithukhat uh a, nangmah hong langpangin thuciamna a bawl uh hi.
verses.6: Edom mite le Ishmael mite, Moab le Hagri mite,
verses.7: Gebal, Ammon le Amalek mite, Filistia le Taia khua mite tawh thuciam a bawl uh hi.
verses.8: Assiria mite in zong amaute pawlpih uh a, amaute pen Lotʼ suanlekhakte adingin pawl muanhuaite ahi uh hi.
verses.9: Endor munah a kizo gawp, leilak ah a luang uh a muat gawp, Midian miteʼ tungah na bawl bang leh, Kishon gun-a Sisera le Jabin-teʼ tungah na bawl bangin amaute tungah bawl in.
verses.11: “Pasianʼ gam hoihte eima tan dingin la ni,” a ci Oreb le Zeeb te bangin amauʼ mi liante bawl inla, Zeba le Zalmunna te bangin amau a ukte khempeuh bawl in.
verses.13: Ka Pasian aw, amaute pen pingpei sunga ninnen, huih mai-a ansi leeng bangsak ta in.
verses.14: Mei in gamlak a hal tum bang, mual liante a kuansak bangin
verses.15: na khuapi huihpi tawh amaute delh inla, na huihpi tawh amaute lausak gawp in.
verses.16: Topa aw, amaute in na min hong zon theih nadingin amaute khempeuh maizumna tawh kidimsak in.
verses.17: Amaute maizumin lungkia densak inla, a mindai-in siasak in.
verses.18: Topa a kici min nei nangmah bek leitung khempeuh ah a Sangpen pa na hihna amaute theisak in.
